name: Lightsoff.js
tagline: A JQuery plugin to show nice guided tour of various elements on your page
body:
lightsOff ========= A JQuery plugin to show nice guided tour of various elements on your page - [embibeswapnil.github.io/lightsOff/]http://embibeswapnil.github.io/lightsOff/ Get Started =========== Include JQuery, lightsoff.js and lightsoff.css

`data-intro="your text" data-intro-position="left/top/right/bottom"` `$.lightsOff()` `$.lightsOn()` Options ======= __Font__ __closeText__ __position__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
